Address.Address1: Via Cengia 8, San Pietro in Cariano

Description.Text: Villa Giona is a traditional 4-star property offering tranquil accommodation northwest of Verona. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, a wine cellar and a great location in the heart of the Italian countryside. Corrubbio di Negarine is a tranquil area northwest of Verona. It is surrounded by lush, green Veneto countryside and offers an excellent rural base to explore the historic city. Local bus services provide fast and easy access to other popular Verona destinations. The hotel is housed in an historic 16th-century villa surrounded by vineyards. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, and free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Classic rooms are cosy and individually decorated in a traditional style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe, work desk and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and tastings at the wine cellar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception, concierge and room service.
